title: Loved by Developers
subtitle: See what developers are saying about UI8Kit

testimonials.name: Sarah Chen
testimonials.content: UI8Kit transformed how we build interfaces. The type safety and semantic output are game changers.

testimonials.name: Marcus Johnson
testimonials.content: Finally, a framework that understands both developer experience and web standards. Highly recommended.

testimonials.name: Elena Rodriguez
testimonials.content: The static generation capabilities helped us achieve perfect Lighthouse scores without any extra effort.
